text: Annie Robe (1866–1922)Annie Robe Griswold; findagrave.com was an English-born American stage actress prominent in the final decades of the Victorian Era, the 1880s and 1890s.New York Tribune; July 29, 1922 "Mrs. D.P. Griswold Buried" She was distantly related, through marriage, to Ethel Barrymore, whose husband Russell Griswold Colt was a relative of Robe's husband Daniel Paine Griswold.Theatre Magazine, Volume 31; edited by W.J. Thorold, Arhur Hornblow, Perriton Maxwell, Stewart Beach Robe died a widow at Pittsfield, Massachusetts on July 26, 1922. The Evening World, July 26, 1922, Page 2 "The Widow of Daniel P. Griswold Dead" ==References== ==External links== * Category:1866 births Category:1922 deaths Category:Actresses from London Category:19th- century American actresses Category:American stage actresses
title: Annie Robe
